services.title: The payment reliability platform Stripe never built.

features.title: Payment Health Score
features.description: A daily 0–100 score that shows how healthy your entire payment system is.
items: combines checkouts, renewals, payouts, and disputes

features.description: Finds hidden checkout issues before customers get stuck or drop off.
items: detects API key and CORS errors
checks domain and Apple/Google Pay setup
flags device and browser-specific failures (e.g. Safari/mobile)

features.title: Subscription & Renewal Monitoring
features.description: Keeps your recurring revenue safe from avoidable subscription failures.
items: identifies high-risk customers before they churn

features.title: Payout & Vendor Monitoring (Stripe Connect)
features.description: Protects your marketplace from silent payout and vendor issues.
items: alerts on restricted or frozen accounts

features.title: Chargeback Watch
features.description: Gives you a fighting chance on every dispute, automatically.
items: links to the exact dispute in Stripe

features.description: Turns raw payment errors into clear, human-readable actions.
items: describes why it happened and severity
deep-links to the right Stripe/PayPal screen

fitness.title: Online Fitness Coaching Platform
fitness.testimonial: "As a fitness coach, I needed to sell online programs and subscriptions. Rackz set up Stripe integration with recurring billing for my monthly coaching plans. Now I'm making $8,500/month in recurring revenue with automated payments."

ecommerce.title: Multi-Currency Online Store
ecommerce.testimonial: "Our e-commerce store needed to accept payments from customers worldwide. Rackz integrated both Stripe and PayPal with multi-currency support. We've increased international sales by 340% and reduced cart abandonment by 45%."

saas.title: SaaS Subscription Platform
saas.testimonial: "As a business consultant, I launched a SaaS platform but struggled with complex subscription billing. Rackz built a complete recurring payment system with proration, coupons, and dunning management. Monthly revenue grew from $2K to $28K in 6 months."

detailed.challenge: Complex multi-vendor payment splitting and compliance
detailed.solution: Marketplace payment infrastructure with automated vendor payouts
detailed.description: David's marketplace needed to handle payments for hundreds of vendors with automated splitting and payouts. We built a robust marketplace payment system with real-time processing.

detailed.challenge: Low donation retention and manual processing
detailed.solution: Recurring donation system with donor management
detailed.description: Maria's non-profit struggled with one-time donations and high processing costs. We implemented a recurring donation system that increased donor retention and reduced costs.

detailed.title: Online Education Platform Streamlines Course Payments
detailed.challenge: Complex course pricing and student payment management
detailed.solution: Multi-tier course payment system with student portals
detailed.description: Dr. Wilson's education platform needed to handle various course types and payment plans. We created a flexible payment system that supports individual courses, bundles, and subscriptions.

detailed.title: Yoga Studio Doubles Revenue with Automated Class Booking
detailed.challenge: Manual booking system and payment collection
detailed.solution: Automated class booking with integrated payment processing
detailed.description: Emma's yoga studio was using manual booking and payment collection. We implemented an automated system that handles class bookings, payments, and membership management seamlessly.

detailed.title: Fashion Boutique Expands Online with Seamless Checkout
detailed.challenge: High cart abandonment and complex inventory management
detailed.solution: Optimized checkout flow with inventory integration
detailed.description: Sophie's fashion boutique struggled with cart abandonment and inventory sync issues. We created a seamless checkout experience with real-time inventory updates and multiple payment options.

detailed.title: Project Management SaaS Achieves 400% Growth with Usage-Based Billing
detailed.challenge: Complex pricing tiers and billing accuracy
detailed.description: Alex's project management SaaS needed sophisticated billing for different user tiers and usage patterns. We implemented usage-based billing with automated invoicing and detailed analytics.

detailed.title: Freelance Services Marketplace Handles $5M+ in Payments
detailed.solution: Secure escrow system with automated release
detailed.description: Rachel's freelance marketplace needed secure escrow payments and dispute resolution. We built a robust system that holds payments in escrow until project completion with automated release mechanisms.

detailed.title: Animal Rescue Organization Streamlines Donation Processing
detailed.challenge: Multiple donation channels and volunteer coordination
detailed.solution: Unified donation platform with volunteer management
detailed.description: Lisa's animal rescue needed to coordinate donations from multiple channels and manage volunteer activities. We created a unified platform that handles donations, volunteer scheduling, and event management.

detailed.title: Corporate Training Platform Scales to 10,000+ Employees
detailed.description: Mark's corporate training platform needed to handle enterprise billing for thousands of employees across multiple companies. We built a scalable system with detailed compliance reporting and automated invoicing.

questions.question: Do you see card data?
questions.answer: No. Stripe and PayPal never expose full card numbers. Rackz Pulse uses secure, read-only access and only sees metadata & payment statuses.

questions.question: Will Pulse break my current checkout?
questions.answer: No. Pulse does not modify your checkout or payment settings. It only monitors and alerts you.

questions.question: Do I need a developer to use Pulse?
questions.answer: No. Setup takes 30 seconds. Everything else is automatic.

questions.question: Does Pulse work with Shopify?
questions.answer: Yes. All Shopify stores using Stripe or PayPal are supported.

questions.question: Can Pulse fix issues automatically?
questions.answer: Pulse provides guided actions and direct links to the exact place in Stripe/PayPal. Some tasks (like retries) can be automated.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Yes. We use Stripe/PayPal OAuth, end-to-end encryption, and never store sensitive data.

questions.question: Do you support Stripe Connect for marketplaces?
questions.answer: Yes, including vendor onboarding, payout issues, KYC failures, and more.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.whatAreCookiesDescription: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit our website.
cookies.howWeUseCookiesDescription: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website, analyze site traffic, and personalize content.
cookies.typesOfCookiesDescription: We use essential cookies, analytics cookies, and marketing cookies to provide the best possible experience.
cookies.managingCookiesDescription: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect website functionality.
cookies.contactUsDescription: If you have any questions about our Cookie Policy, please contact us at:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.informationWeCollectDescription: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us for support.
privacy.howWeUseInformationDescription: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.
privacy.informationSharingDescription: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.
privacy.dataSecurityDescription: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.contactUsDescription: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptanceOfTermsDescription: By accessing and using our services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.serviceDescriptionDescription: Rackz provides payment integration services including but not limited to Stripe, PayPal, and other payment gateway integrations.
terms.paymentTermsDescription: All payments are due upon completion of services. We offer fixed-price packages with guaranteed delivery timelines.
terms.limitationOfLiabilityDescription: In no event shall Rackz be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.
terms.contactInformationDescription: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.moneyBackGuaranteeDescription: We offer a 100% money-back guarantee if we fail to deliver your payment integration within the agreed timeline or meet your specified requirements.
refund.refundEligibilityDescription: Refunds are available within 30 days of project completion if the delivered solution does not meet the agreed specifications.
refund.refundProcessDescription: To request a refund, please contact us with your project details and reason for the refund request. We will review and process refunds within 5-7 business days.
refund.nonRefundableItemsDescription: Refunds are not available for completed projects that meet the agreed specifications or for change of mind after project completion.
refund.contactUsDescription: For refund requests or questions about this policy, please contact us at:

security.title: Security & Compliance
security.pciDssComplianceDescription: We implement PCI-aware solutions. We don't store card data; processing happens on Stripe/PayPal.
security.dataEncryptionDescription: All data is encrypted using industry-standard 256-bit SSL encryption both in transit and at rest.
security.securityMeasuresDescription: We implement comprehensive security measures including regular security audits, vulnerability assessments, and penetration testing.
security.uptimeGuaranteeDescription: We provide rapid, reliable implementations with production readiness checks to ensure service availability.
security.contactSecurityTeamDescription: For security-related questions or to report security issues, please contact our security team at:

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.subtitle: Legal information and company details
imprint.companyDescriptionValue: Rackz is a fintech technology brand under Way Technologies Corp., specializing in embedded payment solutions, custom software development, and expert fintech consulting. We empower small and medium-sized businesses with seamless payment integration, secure payment gateways, and scalable fintech infrastructure to drive growth and digital transformation.
imprint.disclaimerText1: The information provided on this website is for general informational purposes only. While we strive to keep the information up-to-date and correct, we make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability of the website or the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on the website.
imprint.disclaimerText2: Any reliance you place on such information is therefore strictly at your own risk. We are not liable for any loss or damage arising from the use of our services or information provided on this website.
imprint.legalContactText: For any legal inquiries or concerns, please contact us at:
imprint.legalResponseTime: We will respond to all legal inquiries within 48 hours during business days.
